name: D2. RGB Substring  hard version
statement:
.You are given a string s consisting of n characters, each character is
”, ” or ”.You are also given an integer k. Your task is to change the
minimum number of characters in the initial string s so that after the
changes there will be a string of length k that is a substring of s, and
is also a substring of the infinite string "".A string a is a substring
of string b if there exists a positive integer i such that a_1 = b_i,
a_2 = b_{i + 1}, a_3 = b_{i + 2}, ..., a_{|a|} = b_{i + |a| - 1}. For
example, strings "", "", "" are substrings of the infinite string ""
while "", "" and "" are not.You have to answer q independent queries.
